body.p:
Alexandria Campbell Co Ky
April the 17 1861
B Magofin Esqr

Respected sir I have been induced to tax your time and patience by a portion of my company and number of our best Farmres Merchants & and Mechanics By informing you I have received no answer from my call for armes for my company our presant position leads us to fear we will have use for them before we will learn to use them properly I am ^happy^ to inform you your answer to Lincans call on Kentucky for men is received and indorced by most respectfullyable if not by a majority we find our selves surounded by those who will back the the
administration if not overpowered by numbers in the state

I have the pleasure to be your obedient servant
B. J. Beall Capt of the Campbell County Rangers

To his Excelency
B Magofin Gov of Ky

Arms
B. J. Real
Ansd
Ap 22. 1861
